sys_script_include.name: validateEmailPhone

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_9c5852901b12e510b0dcfcc6cc4bcb7f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.validateEmailPhone</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>validateEmailPhone</name><script><![CDATA[function validateEmailPhone(email,phone){
	var phone_pattern = /^\+91+ +[6-9][0-9]{3}-[0-9]{6}$/;
	var email_pattern = /^[a-zA-z_0-9]+@+[a-z-_.A-Z0-9]+\.+[a-z0-9]+$/;
	
	if(phone.match(phone_pattern) && email.match(email_pattern)){
		return 0;
	}
	if(phone.match(phone_pattern) && !email.match(email_pattern)){
		return 1;
	}
	if(!phone.match(phone_pattern) && email.match(email_pattern)){
		return 2;
	}
	else{
		return -1;
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sredevops_usr03</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-15 14:12:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>9c5852901b12e510b0dcfcc6cc4bcb7f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>validateEmailPhone</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9c5852901b12e510b0dcfcc6cc4bcb7f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sredevops_usr03</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-15 14:37:17</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
